Source: inst/CITATION

Sebastian Kreutzer, Christoph Burow, Michael Dietze, Margret C. Fuchs, Christoph Schmidt, Manfred Fischer, Johannes Friedrich, Norbert Mercier, Anne Philippe, Svenja Riedesel, Martin Autzen, Dirk Mittelstrass and Harrison J. Gray (2021). Luminescence: Comprehensive Luminescence Dating Data Analysis. R package version 0.9.14. https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Luminescence
